description:
Power to your pedals. These sleek road shoes are a versatile addition to your riding kit. With carbon reinforced soles, you get a moderately stiff pedalling platform that absorbs shock while efficiently transferring power to your road machine. The smooth cable closure wraps your foot, easing away pressure points and numb spots. From pre-dawn rides to cruisy weekend sessions, these road worthy shoes are ready to spin.

  • Assymetrical upper design holds the foot securely for a natural feeling fit
  • PU lamimates on the upper provide support while enhancing ventilation
  • Staggered collar is sculpted around your ankle's anatomy for a comfortable fit
  • Sleek design is easy to wear with overshoes
  • Nylon midsole reinforced with carbon fibre absorbs vibration and provides stiff pedalling platform
  • Boa® Fit System closure evenly locks your foot in place
  • Compatible with 3-bolt cleats
  • Sleek polyurethane outsole grips on pavement
  • Sole stiffness: 7
name: Fizik Tempo Overcurve R4 - Unisex
